item.title: First The Super Mario Galaxy Movie Trailer Reveals New Characters
item.content:encoded:
The first trailer for The Super Mario Galaxy Movie has been released ahead of its debut in theaters later this month.

The trailer was released as part of a special Nintendo Direct for the movie and gave fans a first look at the overall story that sees Mario and his crew head into space. In addition to a look at the overall story, the trailer officially confirmed two new characters that weren’t in the original: Bowser Jr, and Rosalina

Bowser Jr., if you recall, was leaked just days ago thanks to a box of Pillsbury cookies on a grocery store’s website. Yoshi was also leaked on the box, but he wasn’t in the trailer as it appears that Nintendo is waiting to officially debut the popular green dinosaur.

Two new cast members were also confirmed for the movie. Rosalina will be voiced by Brie Larson, while Bowser Jr. is played by Benny Safdi. Larson is known for her roles in Captain Marvel as the titular character and Scott Pilgrim vs. the World. Safdi, on the other hand, is best known as a director in films like The Smashing Machine and Uncut Gems. He has played roles in various movies, however, such as the main protagonist, Frank Manatee, in Happy Gilmore 2.

You can check out the trailer for yourself, below. The Super Mario Galaxy Movie hits theaters on April 3, 2026, exactly three years after the original.

What did you think of the first The Super Mario Galaxy Movie trailer? Leave your thoughts in the comments below, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more Insider Gaming, read about PlayStation launching its first-ever gaming monitor. And don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Drift 36 Codes (November 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Drift 36 monthly redeem codes for November 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free cash and other rewards. 

Drift 36 is a popular Roblox experience that drops players into the middle of a high-octane drifting and car racing circuit. Players are required to buy their first car upon launch, and from there, progress through the game to get the best automobiles available. With Roblox versions of highly sought-after vehicular brands like Porsche, Lamborghini and Koenigsegg on offer, car enthusiasts will have a fantastic time playing Drift 36. 

Having been released in the early months of 2025, Drift 36 has gradually gained traction over the course of the year and now boasts a fairly dedicated player base. Although simply participating in the various events the game offers is enough for players to keep upgrading their cars, using redeem codes to get some extra cash is never a bad idea. 

Active Drift 36 Codes 

  • THANKYOU2K – $35k (NEW)
  • 992GT3 – $30k
  • NEWRACES – $25k
  • 600KVISIT – $30k
  • NEWCARS – $20k
  • 300KVISIT – $30k
  • 150KVISIT – $30k
  • NEWUPDATE – $30k

Expired Drift 36 Codes 

  • 20KVISIT 
  • 50KVISIT 

How To Redeem Drift 36 Codes

Redeeming codes in games like Drift 36 is a simple process that doesn’t require too much time or effort. It’s just a matter of navigating through the menus of the game and inputting one of the active codes into the text box. These are free rewards given out to all players, so not redeeming them would put you at a disadvantage. Hence, players are urged to redeem all the active codes at the earliest, so they don’t fall behind the competition. Here’s a step-by-step guide to redeeming the codes: 

  1. Open Roblox and launch Drift 36.
  2. Click on the arrow in the top left of the screen.
  3. Click on the ‘Codes’ button. 
  4. Input one of the active codes given above into the text box that opens up.
  5. Click on the ‘Redeem code’ button to claim your rewards.

How To Get More Drift 36 Codes

New codes for Drift 36 are released regularly, albeit not at consistent intervals, which means that players will have to be on their toes to keep track of all the new codes. The developers often drop these codes through their socials or the game’s official Discord server. However, the easiest way to stay on top of all the latest Drift 36 codes would be to simply keep this page bookmarked, as we update it as soon as any new ones drop. 

Having fun using codes in Roblox games? Then check out the latest codes for 99 Nights in the Forest, Type Soul, and Azure Latch. Also, check out the Insider Gaming Discord server.

item.title: ARC Raiders Devs Add Duo Matchmaking in the Latest Update
item.content:encoded:
ARC Raiders’ latest update brings the Duo Matchmaking table along with adjusted cosmetic prices and a free Raider Deck.

Embark Studios’ latest extraction shooter, ARC Raiders, has blown the competition out of the water, with the game hitting a concurrent peak of over 700,000 players across all platforms. As the game continues to break records, the developers have released a new update that adds a much-requested feature to the title, along with some additional changes.

ARC Raiders Duo Matchmaking Was Being Silently Tested Since the Beginning of this Week

According to a new blog post, ARC Raiders’ duo prioritised matchmaking has been silently tested since earlier this week. The developers first prioritise solo and squads to play separately. Post that, duos are prioritised to play with other duos, and the same applies to trios. The developers have also cautioned players that “this is not a 100% guaranteed system”, which means that they “may at times run into differing constellations of players other than your own.”

Along with the duo matchmaking for ARC Raiders, the developers are also making adjustments to store cosmetic prices based on feedback. They have reviewed the prices and “made adjustments to lower prices where applicable”. The new prices will be reflected from Thursday, November 13, at 10:30 CET. Moreover, Raiders who have already purchased at the old pricing will receive compensation for the difference, and their Raider Tokens will be refunded to their account within the coming week.

Lastly, one free Raider Deck is available to all players, and in the future, both free and premium decks will be offered. Players should note that gameplay items will be reserved for free decks as they help new raiders along the way and can be unlocked through progressions. Moreover, there will be no pay-to-win items in premium decks, and they will be based on cosmetics and convenience.

In other news, Embark Studios has defended ARC Raiders’ AI voices by saying ‘every game company‘ does it. Additionally, this game is the perfect extraction shooter for gamers new to the genre. What are your thoughts on duo matchmaking coming to ARC Raiders?Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about SEGA announcing a 10% salary increase for all employees. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Who is Voicing Gambit in Marvel Rivals? Gambit Voice Actor, Explained
item.content:encoded:
A fresh duo of characters have arrived in Marvel Rivals, with Gambit the first to join the fray at the start of Season 5, and we’ve got all the details on who the voice actor is.

Season 5 in Marvel Rivals kicks off on November 14, with Gambit and Rogue joining as playable characters this season, and the trend of boasting an impressive voice cast in the game continues.

If you’re looking for all the details on who the voice actor of Gambit is in Marvel Rivals, or are wondering where you recognize the voice from, we’ve got everything you need to know.

Who is Voicing Gambit in Marvel Rivals?

The voice actor for Gambit in Marvel Rivals is AJ Locascio, a familiar name for fans of the X-Men character.

Locascio also voices Gambit in X-Men ’97 on Disney+, which continues the story set out in the animated series from the 1990s. However, he was not the voice actor for Gambit in the original series; that role was performed by Chris Potter.

Though X-Men ’97 was the first time Locascio filled the role of Remy LeBeau, he more than made it his own with a stellar performance of the fan-favorite character.

That made him a natural choice to fit the role of Gambit in Marvel Rivals and joins a host of other names who have portrayed a character elsewhere before reviving the role in Marvel Rivals, alongside the likes of Yuri Lewanthal, Laura Bailey, Nolan North, and Troy Baker.

What Other Roles Does AJ Locascio Have?

AJ Locascio boasts a host of recognizable roles throughout his career, including the role of Marty McFly in Back to The Future: The Game, and Skjolder in God of War Ragnarok.

Locascio’s career has also seen him play the role of Owen Grady in the Jurassic World: Evolution franchise, Han Solo in LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga, and Jorund in Horizon Forbidden West.

He has also featured in other LEGO Star Wars animated titles, Mighty Morphin’ Power Rangers, Doom Eternal, Voltron: Legendary Defender, and Dawn of the Croods.

How impressed are you with the voice cast in Marvel Rivals? Let us know what additions you’d like to see in the Insider Gaming Discord.

For more Marvel Rivals, check out all the changes to Team-Up Abilities in Season 5, and take a look at the tease of Deadpool and Elsa Bloodstone as future characters.
